attributes.action: Scrap the plans for experienced nurses to have the authority to decide if patients should be resuscitated
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Until now only consultants and GPs were allowed to decide on resuscitation. 

The guidelines were issued by the British Medical Association (BMA), the Royal College of Nursing and the Resuscitation Council. 

Allow for just GPs and consoltants to make this decision
